process_image

function process_image($orifinal_file =  '',
$insert =  FALSE)

Takes an image and saves multiple versions of that image based on the admin options.

Parameters

$orifinal_fileString - Path to the image
$insertCustom image size processed when the user clicks insert image.

Returns

NULL
